channel.title: Comments for page "Ninja-Mas List"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ninja-Mas List"

item.title: Maximum Naughtiness
item.content:encoded:
I've got the naught quest:

 <tbody><tr><td align="center" class="ee" style="background-color:600000; color:FFFFFF">Maximum Naughtiness</td></tr> <tr><td>The Ninja-Mas List shows you at Max Naughtiness!<br><br><font color="04770F">(<b>Requirements:</b> 100 Naughtiness Points)</font></td></tr> <tr><td align="right"> <b>That means.. presents? ></b> <noscript><input type="submit" VALUE="That means.. presents? &gt;"></noscript> </td></tr></tbody> --Prologue-- Sure enough, you check the nearest Ninja-Mas Chimney, and there he is, The HoClaus! Yay? > Maximum Naughtiness --Part 1 of 1-- Checking it twice Sure enough, he checks his list, and you are there. "Well well well, what to do with you.. why don't you close your eyes, and once I'm gone, open them, and you'll get your reward!" That's not creepy at all! > You close your eyes, and hope for a surprise! Continue Maximum Naughtiness > --Epilogue-- You wave goodbye, and sure enough, when you open your eyes, you have a ton of coal! Reroll missed Ally Finds and Ally Levelups for the rest of the day!

I hope this helps.
